Title: Optical caching network: A seamless bridge between electrical packet switching and optical circuit switching
Abstract: © OSA 2020 © 2020 The Author(s).We propose a novel mechanism for instant access of latency-sensitive traffic using optical caching network. Lightpath setup delay can be avoided by caching-based optical circuit switching and the router workload can be reduced by 96%.
